thread.title: Gun-Loving Christian Delivers Epic Message To 'Responsible Gun Owners'
thread.title_full: Gun-Loving Christian Delivers Epic Message To 'Responsible Gun Owners'

author: Susie Madrak
title: Gun-Loving Christian Delivers Epic Message To 'Responsible Gun Owners'
text:
sharethis 10/07/15 2:00pm Mark Carman loves firearms, but he also wants safeguards in place. "You know what that is? That's a semi-automatic handgun," Mark Carman gruffly declares while holding his weapon up to the camera so we can see it. "And I own it. And I like it. You can own one too. In fact, you can own thisâ€¦ Gun Owners , Mark Carman Comments
